net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Set AttackJSON
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Utility macro to apply an arbitrary JSON value for the property attackJSON. Currently no validation is done to ensure a proper format. While empty JSON objects are ignored to prevent accidental overwrites, the value "reset" will reset the object to a blank value.
